org.assertj.swing.driver

Class JTableLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.swing.driver.JTableLocation

  • public final class JTableLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    A visible location on a JTable.
    Author:
    Yvonne Wang, Alex Ruiz

    • Method Detail

      • pointAt

        @RunsInCurrentThread
@Nonnull
public java.awt.Point pointAt(@Nonnull
                                                 javax.swing.JTable table,
                                                 int row,
                                                 int column)

        Converts the given row and column into a coordinate pair. It is assumed that the row and column indices are in the JTable's bounds.

        Note: This method is accessed in the current executing thread. Such thread may or may not be the event dispatch thread (EDT.) Client code must call this method from the EDT.

        Parameters:
        table - the target JTable.
        row - the given row.
        column - the given column.
        Returns:
        the coordinates of the given row and column.

      • cellBounds

        @RunsInCurrentThread
@Nonnull
public java.awt.Rectangle cellBounds(@Nonnull
                                                        javax.swing.JTable table,
                                                        @Nonnull
                                                        TableCell cell)

        Returns the bounds of the given cell.

        Note: This method is accessed in the current executing thread. Such thread may or may not be the event dispatch thread (EDT.) Client code must call this method from the EDT.

        Parameters:
        table - the target JTable.
        cell - the given cell.
        Returns:
        the bounds of the given cell.

      • cellBounds

        @RunsInCurrentThread
@Nonnull
public java.awt.Rectangle cellBounds(javax.swing.JTable table,
                                                        int row,
                                                        int column)

        Returns the bounds of the given row and column.

        Note: This method is accessed in the current executing thread. Such thread may or may not be the event dispatch thread (EDT.) Client code must call this method from the EDT.

        Parameters:
        table - the target JTable.
        row - the given row.
        column - the given column.
        Returns:
        the bounds of the given row and column.
